And a beautiful coincidence. Today is the last day of our second online conference: https://t.co/mwtqYKGGFh. What a way to celebrate! ğŸº

I wished it could have been an in-person conference but fucking COVID got in the way. Maybe next year? ğŸ˜‰

1461287264907112449.text: Today, AsyncAPI is a huge and amazing community, the de-facto standard for defining EDA and asynchronous APIs, and loads of tools. Who could have guessed!! I'm just speechless. https://t.co/ue3UkFvXR6

1461287255088279557.text: That's why I started copying some @OpenApiSpec paragraphs step by step. I needed to start somewhere and OpenAPI already had a structure that was familiar for me. And yes, I was doing this **for me**, I never thought anyone would use AsyncAPI LOL.

1461287249753034757.text:
On a day like today 5 years ago, I pushed the first commit of the @AsyncAPISpec specification.
